trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfo"></xref> objects that are associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfo"> </xref> objetos que estão associados um <xref href="System.Windows.Window"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ThumbButtonInfoCollection is a strongly-typed <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> that is used to support declarations in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: ThumbButtonInfoCollection é fortemente tipado <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601>que é usado para dar suporte a declarações em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] shell allows a maximum of seven buttons in the taskbar preview.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] shell permite um máximo de sete botões na visualização da barra de tarefas.

trans-unit.source: If more than seven <xref:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfo> objects are added to the ThumbButtonInfoCollection, the additional objects are treated as overflow.
trans-unit.target: Se mais de sete <xref:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfo>objetos são adicionados ao ThumbButtonInfoCollection, os objetos adicionais são tratados como estouro.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfo>

trans-unit.source: When a button is <xref:System.Windows.Visibility>, it does not have any visible elements and no space is reserved for it.
trans-unit.target: Quando um botão é <xref:System.Windows.Visibility>, ele não tem elementos visíveis e nenhum espaço é reservado para o proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Visibility>

trans-unit.source: In this case, additional buttons from the ThumbButtonInfoCollection overflow are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, os botões adicionais excedente ThumbButtonInfoCollection são exibidos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfoCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfoCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The new instance of the collection.
